welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bridgwater, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yeovilton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal is a smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Cardiff Airport is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
